extends java.lang.Object

      • vehiclesGoTo

        public void vehiclesGoTo(Connectable outgoingTo,
                         char heading,
                         int outgoingLane,
                         int incomingLane)
        Provide this Road with a Connectable object that will take our outgoing Vehicles.
        Specified by:
        vehiclesGoTo in interface Connectable
        Parameters:
        outgoingTo - The Connectable object which will take our outgoing Vehicles.
        heading - The direction in which Vehicles are heading: 'N', 'S', 'E' or 'W'.
        outgoingLane - The index of our lane from which Vehicles are exiting.
        incomingLane - The index of outgoingTo's lane which will take our Vehicles.

      • setConnection

                          int lane)
        Provide this Road with a Connectable object from which we will take our incoming Vehicles.
        Specified by:
        setConnection in interface Connectable
        Parameters:
        incoming - The Connection object from which we will take our incoming Vehicles.
        heading - The direction in which Vehicles are heading: 'N', 'S', 'E' or 'W'.
        lane - The index of our lane which will take the Vehicles.
